stand alone.translation[0].definitions[1: to be at a distance from other objects or buildings
The house stood alone at the end of the road.
stand alone.translation[1].definitions[0: to continue to do something alone, without help from anyone else
Some of the Pacific islands are too small to stand alone as independent states.
stand alone.translation[1].definitions[1: to be much better than anything or anyone else
For sheer entertainment value, Kelly stood alone.
stand alone.translation[2].definitions[0: a stand-alone computer works without being part of a NETWORK (=a set of computers connected to each other)
The Macintosh, a desktop computer, is usually a stand-alone machine.
stand alone.translation[2].definitions[1: a stand-alone company or business is one that is not part of a large CORPORATION
It is difficult for a stand-alone company our size to get to profitability.
